bibl.title: Greek Law in the Hellenistic Period: Family and Marriage.
bibl.note: A first version of this contribution was published as: What is Hellenistic Law? The Documents of the Judean Desert in the Light of the Papyri from Egypt, The Qumran Chronicle 9 (2000) No. 1, pp. 1-16. - Hellenistic Law and Hellenistic Culture: "Mixed Law" and "Mixed Civilization"; - Greek Contribution and Local Traditions; - Coexistence and Interaction. - Marriage and Family: The Permanence of Hellenistic Law: Marriage; - Family Structures; - Succession.
